query:
SELECT 
  id,
  status,
  video_url,
  error_message,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, created_at, NOW()) as elapsed_seconds
FROM avatar_video_tasks
WHERE created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:30:00'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
command:

  TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, created_at, NOW()) as elapsed_seconds
